name: Mad Hatter
description: A wildly dressed figure with an impossibly tall hat, surrounded by floating teacups and ticking clocks.

dialogue.greeting: Isaac! You're late for tea! Or early. Or right on time. What time is it anyway?

about_tea.philosophy: A cup of tea solves everything, even if it creates new problems!
about_tea.time: Time is just tea waiting to happen!
about_tea.parties: Unbirthdays are better than birthdays - there are more of them!

riddles.time: Why is a raven like a writing desk?
riddles.logic: Sometimes the best sense is nonsense!
riddles.advice: If you think you're going mad, you're probably going the right way!

farewell.initial: Don't be late for your next unbirthday!
